original_text: Now it came to pass after this, that Nahash the king of the children of Ammon died, and his son reigned in his stead.
korean_text: 그 후에 암몬 자손의 왕 나하스가 죽고 그의 아들이 대신하여 왕이 되니

sentences.original_text: Now it came to pass after this
that Nahash the king of the children of Ammon died
and his son reigned in his stead
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들이 그를 대신하여 왕이 되니라
